name: xf86_video_nouveau
desc:
The Xorg Nouveau Driver package contains the X.Org Video Driver 
for NVidia Cards including RIVA TNT, RIVA TNT2, GeForce 256, QUADRO, 
GeForce2, QUADRO2, GeForce3, QUADRO DDC, nForce, nForce2, GeForce4, 
QUADRO4, GeForce FX, QUADRO FX, GeForce 6XXX and GeForce 7xxx chipsets.
